<center>
**Question 1**: Is there evidence that the distance Seward charter boats travel to fish for bottomfish has changed over the years 1993-2014?
<style>
#slide-12 img{display:block;margin:auto;text-align:center;}
</style>

```{r, distmap, echo=FALSE}
colourCount = length(unique(int.dat$YEAR))
getPalette = colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(9, "Set1"))
year.plot <- factor(int.dat$YEAR, levels=c("1993", "1996", "2000", "2004", "2007", "2010", "1994", "1997", "2001", "2005", "2008", "2011", "1995", "1998", "2002", "2006", "2009", "2012", "1999", "2003", "2013", "2014"))
period<-ggplot(int.dat, aes(factor(ADFGSTAT, levels=unique(area.order$ADFGSTAT)),
                    Proportion, group=factor(YEAR)))+
  geom_line(aes(colour=year.plot))+facet_grid(period~.)+
  geom_point(aes(colour=year.plot))+facet_grid(period~.)+
  scale_colour_manual(values=getPalette(colourCount))+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_text(angle=-90))+
  xlab("Statistical Area Ordered by Travel Distance from Seward")+
  theme(legend.position="none")
```
